greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Euler-phi applied to A096503 results in these decimal repdigits.
example: Regular solutions: if x=repdigit+1 is prime, then phi(x)=repdigit.
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = {for (n= 1, nn, phin = eulerphi(n); d = digits(e=eulerphi(n)); if (vecmin(d) == vecmax(d), print1(e, ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 07 2014
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 12 2004
